output.sentences: I love chocolates, especially hand-made and unusual varieties.
This is a fairly typical list of what goes into chocolates.
I do appreciate pretty ribbons and boxes, but really it's what's inside that counts.
I like dried, bitter, bark-like chocolate as much as I like soft, creme-filled chocolate.
Milk chocolate, dark chocolate, white chocolate, I love it all.
